verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I was left, in a place of fear
Barrier, stagnation, all staring at me.
But God’s mighty hand came to rescue me
Now i’ve crossed the lines,
My past is over,
There's no stopping me

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Am breaking every limit
No chains are holding me
Was bound but now am free

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Am on the move
(Am on the move)
My level is changing
(my level is changing)
I'm elevated
(I'm elevated)

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
But God mighty hand came to rescue me
But God mighty hand came to rescue me
